2.message:
assert 'usuario ya existe' in '
<!doctype html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=d...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>'
    +  where '
<!doctype html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=d...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>' = <built-in method lower of str object at 0x000001F8FE8BC680>()
    +    where <built-in method lower of str object at 0x000001F8FE8BC680> = '
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=d...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>'.lower
    +      where '
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=d...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>' = <built-in method decode of bytes object at 0x000001F8FE8BAE00>()
    +        where <built-in method decode of bytes object at 0x000001F8FE8BAE00> = b'
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>'.decode
    +          where b'
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=...rc="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/bootstrap/5.3.2/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>

</body>

</html>' = <HttpResponse status_code=200, "text/html; charset=utf-8">.content

10.message:
assert b'\xc2\xbf2 + 2 es?' in b'{"success": false}'
    +  where b'\xc2\xbf2 + 2 es?' = <built-in method encode of str object at 0x000001F880446380>()
    +    where <built-in method encode of str object at 0x000001F880446380> = '¿2 + 2 es?'.encode
    +      where '¿2 + 2 es?' = <Imagen: TestImg>.pregunta
    +  and   b'{"success": false}' = <JsonResponse status_code=400, "application/json">.content
